Verses: 1 andhappadi Manaivigale, Ungalsondhap Purushargalukkuk Keezhppadindhirungal; Appozhudhu Avargalil Yaaraavadhu Thiruvasanaththirkuk Keezhppadiyaadhavargalaayirundhaal, Bayabakthiyodukoodiya Ungal Karpulla Nadakkaiyai Avargal Paarththu,
2 podhanaiyindri, Manaivigalin Nadakkaiyinaaleye Aadhaayappaduththikkollappaduvaargal.
3 mayiraip Pinni, Ponnaabaranangalai Anindhu, Uyarndha Vasthirangalai Uduththikkolludhalaagiya Purampaana Alangarippu Ungalukku Alangaaramaayiraamal,

4 azhiyaadha Alangarippaayirukkira Saandhamum Amaidhalumulla Aaviyaagiya Irudhayaththil Maraindhirukkira Guname Ungalukku Alangaaramaayirukkakkadavadhu; Adhuve Dhevanudaiya Paarvaiyil Vilaiyerappetradhu.
5 ippadiye Poorvaththil Dhevanidaththil Nampikkaiyaayirundha Parisuththa Sthireegalum Thangaludaiya Purushargalukkuk Keezhppadindhu Thangalai Alangariththaargal.
6 andhappadiye Saaraal Aabiragaamai Aandavan Endru Solli, Avanukkuk Keezhppadindhirundhaal; Neengal Nanmaiseydhu Oru Aabaththukkum Payappadaadhirundheergalaanaal Avalukkup Pillaigalaayiruppeergal.

7 andhappadi Purushargale, Manaiviyaanaval Belaveena Paandamaayirukkirapadiyinaal, Ungal Jebangalukkuth Thadaivaraadhapadikku, Neengal Vivegaththodu Avargaludane Vaazhndhu, Ungaludanekooda Avargalum Niththiyajeevanaagiya Kirubaiyaich Sudhandhariththukkollugiravargalaanapadiyinaal, Avargalukkuch Seyyavendiya Kanaththaich Seyyungal.
8 melum, Neengalellaarum Orumanappattavargalum, Irakkamullavargalum, Sagodhara Sinegamullavargalum Mana Urukkamullavargalum, Inakkamullavargalumaayirundhu,

9 theemaikkuth Theemaiyaiyum, Udhaasanaththukku Udhaasanaththaiyum Sarikkattaamal, Atharkup Pathilaaga, Neengal Aaseervaadhaththaich Sudhandhariththuk Kollumpadi Azhaikkappattirukkiravargalendru Arindhu, Aaseervadhiyungal.
10 jeevanai Virumbi, Nalla Naatkalaik Kaanavendumendrirukkiravan Pollaappukkuth Than Naavaiyum, Kabadaththukkuth Than Uthadugalaiyum Vilakkikkaaththu,
11 pollaappaivittu Neengi, Nanmaiseydhu, Samaadhaanaththaith Thedi, Adhaip Pinthodarakkadavan.

12 karththarudaiya Kangal Needhimaangalmel Nokkamaayirukkiradhu, Avarudaiya Sevigal Avargal Vendudhalukkuk Kavanamaayirukkiradhu; Theemaiseygiravargalukko Karththarudaiya Mugam Virodhamaayirukkiradhu.
13 neengal Nanmaiyaip Pinpatrugiravargalaanaal, Ungalukkuth Theemaiseygiravan Yaar?
14 needhiyinimiththamaaga Neengal Paadupattaal Paakkiyavaangalaayiruppeergal; Avargaludaiya Payamuruththalukku Neengal Payappadaamalum Kalangaamalum Irundhu,

15 karththaraagiya Dhevanai Ungal Irudhayangalil Parisuththampannungal; Ungalilirukkira Nambikkaiyaikkuriththu Ungalidaththil Visaariththuk Ketkira Yaavarukkum Saandhaththodum Vanakkaththotum Uththaravusolla Eppozhudhum Aayaththamaayirungal.

16 kiristhuvukketra Ungal Nalla Nadakkaiyaith Dhooshikkiravargal Ungalai Akkiramakkaararendru Ungalukku Virodhamaaich Sollukira Vishayaththil Vetkappadumpadikku Nalmanachsaatchiyudaiyavargalaayirungal.
17 theemaiseydhu Paadanubavippadhilum, Dhevanukkuch Siththamaanaal, Nanmaiseydhu Paadanubavippadhe Menmaiyaayirukkum.

18 enenil, Kiristhuvum Nammaith Dhevanidaththil Serkkumpadi Aneedhiyullavargalukkup Pathilaaga Needhiyullavaraaip Paavangalinimiththam Orudharam Paadupattaar; Avar Maamsaththile Kolaiyundu, Aaviyile Uyirppikkappattaar.
19 andha Aaviyile Avar Poik Kaavalilulla Aavigalukkup Pirasangiththaar.

20 andha Aavigal, Poorvaththile Novaa Pezhaiyai Aayaththampannum Naatkalile, Dhevan Neetiya Porumaiyode Kaaththirundhapodhu, Keezhppadiyaamar Ponavaigal; Andhap Pezhaiyile Silaraagiya Ettuppermaaththiram Piravesiththu Jalaththinaale Kaakkappattaargal.

21 adharku Oppanaiyaana Gnaanasnaanamaanadhu, Maamsa Azhukkai Neekkudhalaayiraamal, Dhevanaippatrum Nalmanachsaatchiyin Udanpadikkaiyaayirundhu, Ippozhudhu Nammaiyum Yesukiristhuvinudaiya Uyirththezhudhalinaal Ratchikkiradhu;
22 avar Paralogaththirkup Poi, Dhevanudaiya Valadhupaarisaththil Irukkiraar; Dhevadhoodhargalum Adhigaarangalum Vallamaigalum Avarukkuk Keezhppattirukkiradhu.
